rules_text:
Put a power counter on target noncreature artifact you control. It becomes a creature in addition to its other types. If it doesn't have power and toughness, it becomes a 4/4 creature. [i](This effect lasts indefinitely.)[/i]
Flashback {3}{G} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
